_comment: In plugin, you can write name of plugin **NOT FILE NAME OF PLUGIN**
ServerName is url of website(like example.com); Alias is Alias of ServerName
In directory, you can set permission of File/Folder
If you want run YSTWEBER web jar, then you need to put like this
YSTWEBBER_WEB_JAR_LOC: Location of your YSTWEBER Web Jar
_comment: In Error Page, you can set Custom Error Page

ErrorPage._comment: Code should be http error status code(ex. 404, 403, etc..)
In here, you can use "DocumentLocation" to set custom Page or "Redirect" to redirect.
